original: Majjhima Nikāya 106
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Āneñjasappāyasutta
analyzed: āneñja sappāya sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kurūsu viharati kammāsadhammaṁ nāma kurūnaṁ nigamo.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā kurūsu viharati kammāsadhammam nāma kurūnam nigamaḥ

original: Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “bhikkhavo”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhavaḥ ti

original: “Bhadante”ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: bhadanta iti te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “Aniccā, bhikkhave, kāmā tucchā musā mosadhammā.
analyzed: aniccāḥ bhikkhave kāmāḥ tucchāḥ musāḥ mosa dhammāḥ

original: Māyākatametaṁ, bhikkhave, bālalāpanaṁ.
analyzed: bhikkhave

original: Ye ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāmā, ye ca samparāyikā kāmā;
analyzed: ye ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāmā ye ca samparāyikā kāmā

original: yā ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāmasaññā, yā ca samparāyikā kāmasaññā—
analyzed: yā ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāma saññā yā ca samparāyikā kāma saññā

original: ubhayametaṁ māradheyyaṁ, mārassesa visayo, mārassesa nivāpo, mārassesa gocaro.
analyzed: ubhayam etam māra dheyya mārassa isa visayaḥ mārassa isa nivāpaḥ mārassa isa gocaraḥ

original: Etthete pāpakā akusalā mānasā abhijjhāpi byāpādāpi sārambhāpi saṁvattanti.
analyzed: ettha ete pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ mānasāḥ abhijjhā api byāpādā api sa ārambhā api savattanti

original: Teva ariyasāvakassa idhamanusikkhato antarāyāya sambhavanti.
analyzed: te iva ariya sāvakassa idham anusikkhataḥ antarāyāya sambhavanti

original: Tatra, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: tatra bhikkhave ariya sāvakaḥ iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘ye ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāmā, ye ca samparāyikā kāmā;
analyzed: ye ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāmā ye ca samparāyikā kāmā

original: yā ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāmasaññā, yā ca samparāyikā kāmasaññā—
analyzed: yā ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāma saññā yā ca samparāyikā kāma saññā

original: ubhayametaṁ māradheyyaṁ, mārassesa visayo, mārassesa nivāpo, mārassesa gocaro.
analyzed: ubhayam etam māra dheyya mārassa isa visayaḥ mārassa isa nivāpaḥ mārassa isa gocaraḥ

original: Etthete pāpakā akusalā mānasā abhijjhāpi byāpādāpi sārambhāpi saṁvattanti,
analyzed: ettha ete pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ mānasāḥ abhijjhā api byāpādā api sa ārambhā api savattanti

original: teva ariyasāvakassa idhamanusikkhato antarāyāya sambhavanti.
analyzed: te iva ariya sāvakassa idham anusikkhataḥ antarāyāya sambhavanti

original: Yannūnāhaṁ vipulena mahaggatena cetasā vihareyyaṁ abhibhuyya lokaṁ adhiṭṭhāya manasā.
analyzed: yat nūna aham vipulena mahaggatena cetasā vihareyyam abhibhuyya lokam adhiṭṭhāya manasā

original: Vipulena hi me mahaggatena cetasā viharato abhibhuyya lokaṁ adhiṭṭhāya manasā ye pāpakā akusalā mānasā abhijjhāpi byāpādāpi sārambhāpi te na bhavissanti.
analyzed: vipulena hi me mahaggatena cetasā viharataḥ abhibhuyya lokam adhiṭṭhāya manasā ye pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ mānasāḥ abhijjhā api byāpādā api sa ārambhā api te na bhavissanti

original: Tesaṁ pahānā aparittañca me cittaṁ bhavissati appamāṇaṁ subhāvitan’ti.
analyzed: tesam pahānā aparittam ca me cittam bhavissati appamāṇam su bhāvitanti

original: Tassa evaṁpaṭipannassa tabbahulavihārino āyatane cittaṁ pasīdati.
analyzed: tassa eva paṭipannassa tad bahula vihārinaḥ āyatane cittam pasīdati

original: Sampasāde sati etarahi vā āneñjaṁ samāpajjati paññāya vā adhimuccati kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā.
analyzed: sampasāde sati etarahi vā āneñjam samāpajjati paññāya vā adhimuccati kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā

original: Ṭhānametaṁ vijjati yaṁ taṁsaṁvattanikaṁ viññāṇaṁ assa āneñjūpagaṁ.
analyzed: ṭhānam etam vijjati yat tasavattanikam viññāṇam assa āneñjūpaga

original: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamā āneñjasappāyā paṭipadā akkhāyati.
analyzed: bhikkhave paṭhamā āneñjasappāyā paṭipadā akkhāyati

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati:

original: ‘ye ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāmā, ye ca samparāyikā kāmā;
analyzed: ye ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāmā ye ca samparāyikā kāmā

original: yā ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāmasaññā, yā ca samparāyikā kāmasaññā;

original: yaṁ kiñci rūpaṁ sabbaṁ rūpaṁ cattāri ca mahābhūtāni, catunnañca mahābhūtānaṁ upādāyarūpan’ti.
analyzed: yam kiñci rūpam sabbam rūpam cattāri ca mahābhūtāni catunnam ca mahābhūtānam

original: ubhayametaṁ aniccaṁ.
analyzed: ubhayam etam anit ca

original: Tassa evaṁpaṭipannassa tabbahulavihārino āyatane cittaṁ pasīdati.
analyzed: tassa eva paṭipannassa tad bahula vihārinaḥ āyatane cittam pasīdati

original: Sampasāde sati etarahi vā āneñjaṁ samāpajjati paññāya vā adhimuccati kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā.
analyzed: sampasāde sati etarahi vā āneñjam samāpajjati paññāya vā adhimuccati kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā

analyzed: ṭhānam etam vijjati yat tasavattanikam viññāṇam assa āneñjūpaga

analyzed: bhikkhave tatiyā āneñjasappāyā paṭipadā akkhāyati

analyzed: ye ca diṭṭhadhammikāḥ rūpā ye ca samparāyikāḥ rūpā

original: Yatthetā aparisesā nirujjhanti etaṁ santaṁ etaṁ paṇītaṁ—

analyzed: ṭhānam etam vijjati yam tasavattanikam viññāṇam assa ākiñcañña āyatana upaga

analyzed: ayam bhikkhave paṭhamā ākiñcaññāyatana sappāyā paṭipadā akkhāyati

original: ‘nāhaṁ kvacani kassaci kiñcanatasmiṁ, na ca mama kvacani kismiñci kiñcanaṁ natthī’ti.
analyzed: na aham kvacani kassaci na ca mama kvacani kismiñci kiñcanam natthi iti

original: Tassa evaṁpaṭipannassa tabbahulavihārino āyatane cittaṁ pasīdati.
analyzed: tassa eva paṭipannassa tad bahula vihārinaḥ āyatane cittam pasīdati

original: Sampasāde sati etarahi vā ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samāpajjati paññāya vā adhimuccati kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā.
analyzed: sampasāde sati etarahi vā ākiñcaññāyatanam samāpajjati paññāya vā adhimuccati kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā

original: Ṭhānametaṁ vijjati yaṁ taṁsaṁvattanikaṁ viññāṇaṁ assa ākiñcaññāyatanūpagaṁ.
analyzed: ṭhānam etam vijjati yam tasavattanikam viññāṇam assa ākiñcañña āyatana upaga

original: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, tatiyā ākiñcaññāyatanasappāyā paṭipadā akkhāyati.
analyzed: bhikkhave tatiyā ākiñcaññāyatana sappāyā paṭipadā akkhāyati

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati:

analyzed: ye ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāmā ye ca samparāyikā kāmā

original: yā ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāmasaññā, yā ca samparāyikā kāmasaññā;
analyzed: yā ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāma saññā yā ca samparāyikā kāma saññā

original: ye ca diṭṭhadhammikā rūpā, ye ca samparāyikā rūpā;
analyzed: ye ca diṭṭhadhammikāḥ rūpā ye ca samparāyikāḥ rūpā

original: yā ca diṭṭhadhammikā rūpasaññā, yā ca samparāyikā rūpasaññā;
analyzed: yā ca diṭṭhadhammikā rūpa saññā yā ca samparāyikā rūpa saññā

original: yā ca āneñjasaññā, yā ca ākiñcaññāyatanasaññā—
analyzed: yā ca āneñja saññā yā ca ākiñcañña āyatana saññā

original: sabbā saññā.
analyzed: sabbā saññā

original: Yatthetā aparisesā nirujjhanti etaṁ santaṁ etaṁ paṇītaṁ—
analyzed: yattha itāḥ aparisesāḥ nirujjhanti etam santam etam paṇīta

original: yadidaṁ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanan’ti.
analyzed: yat idam na ivasaññānāsaññāyatananti

original: Tassa evaṁpaṭipannassa tabbahulavihārino āyatane cittaṁ pasīdati.
analyzed: tassa eva paṭipannassa tad bahula vihārinaḥ āyatane cittam pasīdati

original: Sampasāde sati etarahi vā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ samāpajjati paññāya vā adhimuccati kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā.
analyzed: sampasāde sati etarahi vā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanam samāpajjati paññāya vā adhimuccati kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā

original: Ṭhānametaṁ vijjati yaṁ taṁsaṁvattanikaṁ viññāṇaṁ assa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanūpagaṁ.
analyzed: ṭhānam etam vijjati yam tasa vattanikam viññāṇam assa nevasaññānāsaññāyatana upaga

original: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasappāyā paṭipadā akkhāyatī”ti.
analyzed: aya bhikkhave nevasaññānāsaññāyatana sappāyā paṭipadā akkhāyati iti

original: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “idha, bhante, bhikkhu evaṁ paṭipanno hoti:
analyzed: idha bhante bhikkhu evam paṭipannaḥ hoti

original: ‘no cassa, no ca me siyā; na bhavissati, na me bhavissati; yadatthi yaṁ, bhūtaṁ—taṁ pajahāmī’ti.
analyzed: no ca assa no ca me siyā na bhavissati na me bhavissati yat atthi bhūtatam pajahāmi iti

original: Evaṁ upekkhaṁ paṭilabhati.
analyzed: evam upekkham paṭilabhati

original: Parinibbāyeyya nu kho so, bhante, bhikkhu na vā parinibbāyeyyā”ti?
analyzed: parinibbāyeyya nu kho so bhante bhikkhu na vā parinibbāyeyya ati

original: “Apetthekacco, ānanda, bhikkhu parinibbāyeyya, apetthekacco bhikkhu na parinibbāyeyyā”ti.
analyzed: apa ittha ekaccaḥ ānanda bhikkhu parinibbāyeyya apa ittha ekaccaḥ bhikkhu na parinibbāyeyya ati

original: “Ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo yenapetthekacco bhikkhu parinibbāyeyya, apetthekacco bhikkhu na parinibbāyeyyā”ti?
analyzed: kaḥ nu kho bhante hetu kaḥ paccayaḥ yena pa itthā ekaccaḥ bhikkhu parinibbāyeyya apa itthā ekaccaḥ bhikkhu na parinibbāyeyya ati

original: “Idhānanda, bhikkhu evaṁ paṭipanno hoti:
analyzed: idha ānanda bhikkhu evam paṭipannaḥ hoti

original: ‘no cassa, no ca me siyā; na bhavissati, na me bhavissati; yadatthi, yaṁ bhūtaṁ—taṁ pajahāmī’ti.
analyzed: no ca assa no ca me siyā na bhavissati na me bhavissati yat atthi yam bhūtatam pajahāmi iti

original: Evaṁ upekkhaṁ paṭilabhati.
analyzed: evam upekkham paṭilabhati

original: So taṁ upekkhaṁ abhinandati, abhivadati, ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
analyzed: so tam upekkham abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati

original: Tassa taṁ upekkhaṁ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato tannissitaṁ hoti viññāṇaṁ tadupādānaṁ.
analyzed: tassa tam upekkham abhinandataḥ abhivadataḥ ajjhosāya tiṭṭhataḥ tad nissitam hoti viññāṇam tad upādāna

original: Saupādāno, ānanda, bhikkhu na parinibbāyatī”ti.
analyzed: sa aupādānaḥ ānanda bhikkhu na parinibbāyati iti

original: “Kahaṁ pana so, bhante, bhikkhu upādiyamāno upādiyatī”ti?
analyzed: kaham pana saḥ bhante bhikkhu upādiyamānaḥ upādiyati iti

original: “Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ, ānandā”ti.
analyzed: na ivasaññā nāsañña āyatane ānanda ati

original: “Upādānaseṭṭhaṁ kira so, bhante, bhikkhu upādiyamāno upādiyatī”ti?
analyzed: upādāna seṭṭham kira saḥ bhante bhikkhu upādiyamānaḥ upādiyati iti

original: “Upādānaseṭṭhañhi so, ānanda, bhikkhu upādiyamāno upādiyati.
analyzed: upādāna seṭṭham hi saḥ ānanda bhikkhu upādiyamānaḥ upādiyati

original: Upādānaseṭṭhañhetaṁ, ānanda, yadidaṁ—
analyzed: upādāna seṭṭhan ha itas ānanda yat idam

original: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ.
analyzed: na ivasaññā nāsañña āyatana

original: Idhānanda, bhikkhu evaṁ paṭipanno hoti:
analyzed: idha ānanda bhikkhu evam paṭipannaḥ hoti

original: ‘no cassa, no ca me siyā; na bhavissati, na me bhavissati; yadatthi, yaṁ bhūtaṁ—taṁ pajahāmī’ti.
analyzed: no ca assa no ca me siyā na bhavissati na me bhavissati yat atthi yam bhūtatam pajahāmi iti

original: Evaṁ upekkhaṁ paṭilabhati.
analyzed: evam upekkham paṭilabhati

original: So taṁ upekkhaṁ nābhinandati, nābhivadati, na ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
analyzed: so tam upekkham na abhinandati na abhivadati na ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati

original: Tassa taṁ upekkhaṁ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato na tannissitaṁ hoti viññāṇaṁ na tadupādānaṁ.
analyzed: tassa tam upekkham an abhinandataḥ an abhivadataḥ an ajjhosāya tiṭṭhataḥ na tat nissitam hoti viññāṇam na tat upādāna

original: Anupādāno, ānanda, bhikkhu parinibbāyatī”ti.
analyzed: anupādānaḥ ānanda bhikkhu parinibbāyati iti

original: “Acchariyaṁ, bhante, abbhutaṁ, bhante.
analyzed: acchariya bhante abbhuta bhante

original: Nissāya nissāya kira no, bhante, bhagavatā oghassa nittharaṇā akkhātā.
analyzed: nissāya nissāya kira naḥ bhante bhagavatā oghassa nittharaṇā akkhātā

original: Katamo pana, bhante, ariyo vimokkho”ti?
analyzed: katamaḥ pana bhante ariyaḥ vimokkhaḥ ti

original: “Idhānanda, bhikkhu ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: idha ānanda bhikkhu ariya sāvakaḥ iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘ye ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāmā, ye ca samparāyikā kāmā;
analyzed: ye ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāmā ye ca samparāyikā kāmā

original: yā ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāmasaññā, yā ca samparāyikā kāmasaññā;
analyzed: yā ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāma saññā yā ca samparāyikā kāma saññā

original: ye ca diṭṭhadhammikā rūpā, ye ca samparāyikā rūpā;
analyzed: ye ca diṭṭhadhammikāḥ rūpā ye ca samparāyikāḥ rūpā

original: yā ca diṭṭhadhammikā rūpasaññā, yā ca samparāyikā rūpasaññā;
analyzed: yā ca diṭṭhadhammikā rūpa saññā yā ca samparāyikā rūpa saññā

original: yā ca āneñjasaññā, yā ca ākiñcaññāyatanasaññā, yā ca nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaññā—
analyzed: yā ca āneñja saññā yā ca ākiñcañña āyatana saññā yā ca nevasaññānāsaññāyatana saññā

original: esa sakkāyo yāvatā sakkāyo.
analyzed: esa sakkāyaḥ yāvatā sakkāyaḥ

original: Etaṁ amataṁ yadidaṁ anupādā cittassa vimokkho.
analyzed: etam amatam yat idam anupādā cittassa vimokkho

original: Iti, kho, ānanda, desitā mayā āneñjasappāyā paṭipadā, desitā ākiñcaññāyatanasappāyā
analyzed: iti kho ānanda desitā mayā āneñja sappāyā paṭipadā desitā ākiñcaññāyatana sappāyā

original: paṭipadā, desitā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasappāyā paṭipadā, desitā nissāya nissāya oghassa
analyzed: paṭipadā desitā nevasaññā nāsañña āyatana sappāyā paṭipadā desitā nissāya nissāya oghassa

original: nittharaṇā, desito ariyo vimokkho.
analyzed: nittharaṇā desitaḥ ariyaḥ vimokkho

original: Yaṁ kho, ānanda, satthārā karaṇīyaṁ sāvakānaṁ hitesinā anukampakena anukampaṁ upādāya, kataṁ vo taṁ mayā.
analyzed: yam khalu ānanda satthārā karaṇīyam sāvakānam hita īsinā anukampakena anukampam upādāya katam vaḥ tam mayā

original: Etāni, ānanda, rukkhamūlāni, etāni suññāgārāni. Jhāyathānanda, mā pamādattha, mā pacchā vippaṭisārino ahuvattha. Ayaṁ vo amhākaṁ anusāsanī’”ti.
analyzed: etāni ānanda rukkha mūlāni etāni suññāgārāni jhāyatha ānanda mā pamādattha mā pacchā vippaṭisārinaḥ ahuvattha ayam vaḥ amhākam anusāsanī iti

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamano āyasmā ānando bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.
analyzed: āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandi iti

original: Āneñjasappāyasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ chaṭṭhaṁ.
analyzed: āneñjasappāya suttam niṭṭhitam chaṭṭha
